Function reference

Object

Function for the ScreenR Object

create_edger_obj()
Create edgeR Object
create_screenr_object()
Create the ScreenR Object
get_annotation_table()
Get ScreenR annotation table
get_count_table()
Get ScreenR count table
get_data_table()
Get ScreenR data_table
get_groups()
Get ScreenR groups
get_normalized_count_table()
Get ScreenR normalized_count_table
get_replicates()
Get ScreenR replicates
set_annotation_table()
Set ScreenR annotation table
set_count_table()
Set ScreenR count table
set_data_table()
Set ScreenR data_table
set_groups()
Set ScreenR groups
set_normalized_count_table()
Set ScreenR normalized_count_table
set_replicates()
Set ScreenR replicates

Computation

Function used to perform computations

barcode_lost()
Count number of barcode lost
compute_data_table()
Compute data Table
compute_metrics()
Compute Metrics
compute_slope()
Compute Slope of a Gene
count_mapped_reads()
Count the number of mapped read
mapped_reads()
Mapped Reads
normalize_data()
Normalize data
remove_all_zero_row()
Remove rows that have zero count in all samples

Find Hit

Function used to find hits

find_camera_hit()
Find Camera Hit
find_common_hit()
Find common hit
find_roast_hit()
Find Roast Hit
find_robust_zscore_hit()
Title Find robust Z-score Hit
find_zscore_hit()
Title Find Z-score Hit

Further Optimization

Function to further optimize the hit found

filter_by_slope()
Filter using the slope filter
filter_by_variance()
Filter using the variance filter

Plot

Functions used to visualize the data

plot_barcode_hit()
Plot barcode hit
plot_barcode_lost()
Plot number of barcode lost
plot_barcode_lost_for_gene()
Plot number of barcode lost for gene
plot_barcode_trend()
Plot the trend over time of the barcodes
plot_boxplot()
Plot Barcodes Hit
plot_common_hit()
Plot common hit
plot_explained_variance()
Plot the explained variance by the PC
plot_mapped_reads()
Plot mapped reads
plot_mapped_reads_distribution()
Plot the distribution of the mapped reads
plot_mds()
Multidimensional Scaling Plot
plot_trend()
Plot the trend hit gene
plot_zscore_distribution()
Plot distribution Z-score
